name: Shotris
description:
This game is a combination of Tetris and Shooters.  The great idea is from Sword nail   <HOW TO PLAY>          TETRIS BLOCKS NEED TO BE CONNECTED IN A ROW 

     THE CHARACTER NEEDS TO SHOOT THE ENEMIES

    <CONTROLLS>
1 PLAYER :
WASD TO MOVE THE PLAYER
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON TO SHOOT
LEFT ARROW AND RIGHT ARROW TO MOVE THE TETRIS BLOCK
DOWN ARROW TO FALL FASTER
UP ARROW TO ROTATE

2 PLAYERS

1P:
ARROWS FOR THE PLAYER
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON TO SHOOT

2P: A  AND D TO MOVE THE TETRIS BLOCK S TO FALL FASTER
W TO ROTATE IT
